definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: This is because the palladium nanoparticles continued to release trapped electrons.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲鈀納米顆粒在不斷地釋放捕獲的電子。

sentences.english: Silver and palladium face a similarly loose market.
sentences.chinese: 銀和鈀同樣面臨寬鬆的市場。

sentences.english: A palladium phthalocyanine-PVC membrane electrode for thiocyanate ion was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 研製了酞菁鈀PVC膜硫氰酸根離子選擇性電極。

sentences.english: Does general public care what is "palladium-catalyzed cross couplings in organic synthesis" ?
sentences.chinese: 公衆是否關心什麼是“有機合成中鈀催化交叉耦合”？

sentences.english: Platinum and palladium are used mostly to make pollution- control devices for cars and trucks.
sentences.chinese: 鉑和鈀主要用於製造轎車和卡車上的污染控制設備。

sentences.english: Diazonium Salts as Substrates in Palladium-Catalyzed Cross-Coupling Reactions.
sentences.chinese: 重氮鹽類爲襯底在鈀催化交叉偶聯反應。

sentences.english: The effects of the different amounts of Pd C catalyst on the hydrogenation of raw lacquer were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同用量的鈀炭催化劑對生漆催化氫化的影響。

sentences.english: Influence of heavy rare earth oxides on the activity of Pd catalyst has been discussed in this article.
sentences.chinese: 研究了重稀土氧化物對鈀催化劑活性的影響。

sentences.english: Based on the theory of self-assembly technology, nano Pd catalysis layer was formed on the polyester fabric, and the preparation technic of chitosan-Pd catalytic membrane was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 用自組裝技術在滌綸織物上形成納米級鈀金屬催化層。

sentences.english: Process of Pd plating from system of potassium citrate and ammonium oxalate is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究在檸檬酸鉀和草酸銨鍍液體系中鍍鈀工藝。

sentences.english: The graphite furnace atomic absorption spectrometry(GFAAS)was established for determination of the trace palladium in famciclovir.
sentences.chinese: 採用石墨爐原於吸收光譜法測定泛昔洛韋中痕量鈀。

sentences.english: The walls of the workrooms were a dull gray color.
sentences.chinese: 工場間的牆壁全是一片暗灰鈀。

sentences.english: 'There are better opportunities in silver and palladium, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，銀和鈀有更好的機會。

sentences.english: Suitable conditions of stripping palladium with ammonium chloride-(ammonia) solution are also studied.
sentences.chinese: 也考察了氯化銨的氨水溶液反萃取鈀的適宜條件。

sentences.english: Deuterons absorbed in the palladium lattice would form a sublattice in non-equilibrium state.
sentences.chinese: 鈀晶格中所吸附的氘會形成處於非平衡態的次晶格。

sentences.english: Recovery of palladium and silver from waste containing palladium, silver and copper are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了從含鈀銀銅的廢料中分離回收鈀和銀。

definition: operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
a long narrow vessel with two masts
